Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/Iron
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Iron, 34th, Justine, then resume their normal route on 35th, due to street blockage nr 35th/Iron

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #35 31st/35th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Iron, 34th, Justine, then resume their normal route on 35th, due to street blockage near 35th/Iron.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
